channel.title: Client not wanting to connect from a friends pc
channel.description: hey guys i changed my server ip to the mine for now because i want some friends to come on and help me find some bugs but when i sent them the client they cant log in i have everything set up but still not working the client works on my side for me port and ip in setting is set up right on it but still no use can u help please

item.title: Client not wanting to connect from a friends pc
item.dc:creator: @Kapitein_Bier Kapitein Bier
item.description:
@Kapitein_Bier wrote:

Forward the port of the rsc server to your internal IP of the server/computer hosting the RSC server, or else the router doesnt know what to do with the request.

Read full topic
item.source: Client not wanting to connect from a friends pc
